info.senderName: NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM
info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued July 11 at 6:53PM MDT until July 11 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM
info.description:
The National Weather Service in El Paso has issued a
* Dust Storm Warning for... East central Luna County in southwestern New Mexico... West central Dona Ana County in south central New Mexico...
* Until 900 PM MDT.
* At 652 PM MDT, New Mexico State Police reported blowing dust along Interstate 10 east of Mile Marker 90.
HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility with strong winds up to 50 mph.
SOURCE...Law enforcement.
IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel.
* This includes Interstate 10 in New Mexico between mile markers 90 and 128.
Locations impacted include... Akela, Corralitos, Deming Ranchettes, and Southern New Mexico State Fairgrounds.
info.instruction: Dust storms lead to dangerous driving conditions with visibility reduced to near zero. If driving, avoid dust storms if possible. If caught in one, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.

parameter.value: NWS: DUST STORM WARNING til 9:00 PM MDT. Be ready for a sudden drop to zero visibility.

National Weather Service: DUST STORM WARNING for this area until 9:00 PM MDT. Be ready for sudden drop to zero visibility. Pull Aside, Stay Alive! When visibility drops, pull far off the road and put your vehicle in park. Turn the lights off and keep your foot off the brake. Infants, the elderly and those with respiratory issues urged to take precautions.

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 9:00 PM MDT. Espere reduccion de visibilidad.

AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 9:00 PM MDT. Estar alerta para una reduccion repentina en visibilidad. Cuando la visibilidad disminuya, mueva su vehiculo fuera de la carretera. Apague las luces y mantenga su pie fuera del freno. Se recomienda enfaticamente el tomar precauciones para los infantes, ancianos y personas con problemas respiratorios.
